scripts.release: npm run clean && python3 src/nyalib/Tools/nyacss.py css/index.css src/index.css && gulp css html && rm -f src/index.css && mv dist/index.html ./index.html && webpack --mode=production --progress
scripts.debug: npm run clean && python3 src/nyalib/Tools/nyacss.py css/index.css src/index.css && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && rm -f src/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html && cp templates/*.html dist/ && webpack --mode=development --progress
scripts.html: npm run clean && python3 src/nyalib/Tools/nyacss.py css/index.css src/index.css && python3 src/nyalib/Tools/nyacss.py templates dist && cp src/index.css dist/index.css && rm -f src/index.css && cp src/index.html ./index.html && cp templates/*.html dist/
